Name: Accounting
Question: I can read and understand a balance sheet and annual report, read financial prognoses, etc.

Name: Financial administration
Question: I can enter and read out financial data.

Name: Budgeting
Question: I can budget a project in advance, in which I take time, money, quality, uncertainties and the requirements and wishes of the client into account.

Name: General planning
Question: I can always assess well the time that I or others need, map the coherence between this and determine, monitor and meet deadlines.

Name: Traffic and Purchase
Question: I can supply the necessary goods or externally hired people at the right place and the right time, in which I always take price and quality into account.

Name: Create project document
Question: I can describe a project in a document including all relevant functions, description of concepts and formulations, in which that document suffices in order to implement the necessary working assignments, and can be distributed both internally and externally to clients

Name: Verbal briefing
Question: I can provide for a verbal briefing as a result of which the listeners know exactly what has to be carried out and which internal and external client expectations have to be complied with

Name: Written briefing
Question: On the basis of a project document or on the basis of input from the client or a colleague I can formulate a working assignment with all relevant information for the person (implementer) with which he/she can carry out the activities independently
